name: TerrainBASEMOD
description: IMPORTANT: MAKE YOUR MOD DEPENDENT ON THIS IN YOUR OWN MOD'S modinfo.json, THIS IS A BASEMOD FOR OTHER MODDERS TO USE, with this you will be able to use various terrains that are all vividly and uniquely colored for making ALIEN/RPG/FANTASY/SCI-FI and all sorts of TERRAINS
